properties.description: SQL Script to query JSON files in datalake

content.query:
-- Create a db master key if one does not already exist, using your own password.
-- CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD='<EnterStrongPasswordHere>';

-- Create a database scoped credential with the workspace managed IDENTITY
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [ba-synapse01-kn3acb6lw3vr4]
WITH IDENTITY = 'MANAGED IDENTITY'

-- Create EXTERNAL FILE Format as JSON not explicitly required for SQL Serverless. The format used by OPENROWSET is CSV

--Create External Data Source
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [sec-form10q]
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://badatalake01kn3acb6lw3vr.dfs.core.windows.net/curated-silver/sec-form10q' --'https://<storage_account>.dfs.core.windows.net/<container>/<path>'
          ,CREDENTIAL = [ba-synapse01-kn3acb6lw3vr4]
)


--Query Single file
select top 10 *
from openrowset(
        bulk '2023/04/standardized_2023-04-16_141247_sec-form10q.json/part-00000-f814e8bd-a2fe-4bbd-82d7-acef0a1625af-c000.json',
        data_source = 'sec-form10q',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows


--Query multiple files using wildcards
select top 10 *
from openrowset(
        bulk '*/*/*/part*.json',
        data_source = 'sec-form10q',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows


--Flatten with OPENJSON
select top 10 *
from openrowset(
        bulk '*/*/*/part*.json',
        data_source = 'sec-form10q',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
cross apply openjson(doc)
with (org_name varchar(50) '$.org_name'
    ,org_address varchar(400) '$.org_address'
    ,org_jurisdiction varchar(100) '$.org_jurisdiction'
    ,org_stock_ticker varchar(5) '$.org_stock_ticker'
    ,reporting_quarter varchar(20) '$.reporting_quarter'
    ,stock_exchange varchar(10) '$.stock_exchange'
    ,total_assets int '$.total_assets'
    ,total_comprehensive_income int '$.total_comprehensive_income'
    ,total_equity int '$.total_equity'
    ,total_liabilities int '$.total_liabilities'
    ,mgmt_analysis varchar(MAX) '$.mgmt_analysis'
    ,risk_disclosure varchar(MAX) '$.risk_disclosure'
    ,controls_procedures varchar(MAX) '$.controls_procedures'
    ,mgmt_analysis_summary varchar(100) '$.mgmt_analysis_summary'
    ,risk_disclosure_summary varchar(100) '$.risk_disclosure_summary'
    ,controls_procedures_summary varchar(100) '$.controls_procedures_summary'
    )
